title: The Most Anticipated TV Shows of 2020 | The Watch
description:
Chris previews the TV landscape for 2020, including what might fill the void left by 'Game of Thrones' (1:00), his 10 most anticipated shows of 2020 (5:15), and what to look out for in the next stage of the streaming wars (34:00).

Host: Chris Ryan

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
